doc.title: GSAP Parallax Pattern (Lines 212-272)
doc.snippet:
Parallax Pattern: - Different elements scroll at different speeds (depth illusion) - Background moves slower, foreground moves faster - Use scrollTrigger with scrub: true for scroll-linked animation - ease: 'none' for linear parallax movement - Set will-change: transform in CSS for GPU acceleration
Example: gsap.to('.hero-bg', { y: '30%', ease: 'none', scrollTrigger: { scrub: true } }) Example: gsap.to('.hero-text', { y: '60%', ease: 'none', scrollTrigger: { scrub: true } })
Key: Higher y percentage = faster movement, creating depth separation
doc.reason: Defines parallax implementation pattern for 2-column scroll effect (AC #2)

doc.title: Epic 2 Premium Components Usage (Lines 1-546)
doc.snippet:
Premium Components Available (Story 2.0 - Production Ready):
1. useMagneticPull Hook: - Cursor-following magnetic effect, throttled to 60fps - Strength: 0.3 default (30% of maxDistance) - Max distance: 150px (cursor detection radius) - Auto-disables on mobile (<768px viewport) - Usage: const ctaRef = useMagneticPull({ strength: 0.3, maxDistance: 150 })
2. CRE8TIVE_EASINGS: - organic: "power4.out" (smooth deceleration) - smooth: "power2.out" (Apple-like refinement) - spring: "elastic.out(1, 0.5)" (energetic bounce - use for checkmarks) - cinematic: "power4.inOut" (dramatic slowdown)
3. OrganicCard Component: - Shape variants: blob, hexagon, organic, floating - Morphing animation: morphing={true}, morphIntensity={0.05} (±5% variance) - Glow effect: glowColor="#06b6d4" (cyan) - Performance: Max 3 morphing shapes, 3 glows per viewport
Import Pattern: import { useMagneticPull, CRE8TIVE_EASINGS, OrganicCard } from '@/components/epic2'

interface.name: useMagneticPull
interface.signature:
function useMagneticPull(options: MagneticPullOptions = {}): React.RefObject<HTMLDivElement>
interface MagneticPullOptions { strength?: number; // 0-1, pull intensity (default: 0.3) maxDistance?: number; // Max pixels element can move (default: 30) ease?: string; // GSAP easing (default: 'power2.out') rotation?: boolean; // Enable rotation on pull (default: false) rotationIntensity?: number; // 0-1, rotation amount (default: 0.1) }

tests.ideas:
Test Idea 1: Parallax Scroll Effect (AC #2) - Manual scroll through Studios Connection section - Verify right column moves slower than left (depth perception visible) - Verify background organic shapes move slowest (deepest layer) - Check smooth scroll with no jank (scrub: true) - Criteria: Visual depth separation between layers
Test Idea 2: Checkmark Elastic Stagger (AC #3) - Scroll into Studios Connection section to trigger animation - Verify checkmarks bounce in sequentially (0.1s stagger visible) - Check visible elastic overshoot (bounce characteristic of elastic.out) - Initial state: checkmarks rotated -45deg, scale 0 - Final state: checkmarks upright, scale 1 - Criteria: 8 checkmarks total (4 left + 4 right), all bounce visibly
Test Idea 3: Magnetic CTA + Dynamic Glow (AC #4) - Hover near "See Studios Portfolio →" button (within 150px radius) - Verify button moves toward cursor (magnetic pull, max 30px movement) - Check glow effect increases intensity when cursor is closer - Glow color: cyan to fuchsia gradient - Box-shadow blur: 0-40px based on cursor proximity - Criteria: Smooth magnetic pull + visible glow intensity change
Test Idea 4: Organic Flow Shapes (AC #5) - Visual inspection of Studios Connection section background - Verify 2-3 organic blob shapes visible between columns - Check shapes have gradient fill (indigo → cyan, 10-15% opacity) - Verify subtle morphing/breathing animation (shape varies ±3% over 8s loop) - Shapes scroll at slowest parallax speed (deepest layer) - Criteria: Shapes enhance visual connection without distracting from content
Test Idea 5: Responsive Breakpoints (AC #6) - 375px mobile: 1 column stack, static checkmarks (fade-in), no parallax, no magnetic CTA, shapes hidden - 768px tablet: 2 columns, parallax reduced 50%, elastic checkmarks enabled, magnetic CTA reduced distance - 1024px+ desktop: Full premium animations (all features enabled) - Chrome DevTools Performance tab: Verify 60fps maintained at all breakpoints - Criteria: Graceful degradation on mobile, premium experience on desktop
Test Idea 6: Copy Accuracy (AC #10) - Side-by-side comparison with COPY_IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md lines 626-685 - Verify section header: "From Storyboard to Professional Video" - Verify left column: badge, title, 4 features, supporting text - Verify right column: badge, title, 4 features, CTA button text - Verify bottom statement matches exactly - Criteria: Pixel-perfect word-for-word match with copy guide
Test Idea 7: Integration & Routing (AC #7) - Navigate to Briefing Engine page - Scroll to Studios Connection section (after BriefingProcessFlow) - Click "See Studios Portfolio →" CTA button - Verify routing to /studios page (React Router Link) - Verify smooth scroll with Lenis - Verify no layout shifts (CLS ≤0.1) - Criteria: Full page renders, Studios Connection visible, CTA routing works
Test Idea 8: Build & Code Quality (AC #8) - Run npm run build: verify TypeScript compiles with 0 errors - Run npm run lint: verify ESLint passes (0 errors, warnings OK) - Code review: verify React cleanup patterns (useGSAP cleanup, useMagneticPull cleanup) - Check no console.log statements in production code - Verify all components follow frontend-architecture.md patterns - Criteria: Clean build, clean lint, proper React cleanup
Test Idea 9: Performance Profiling (AC #6, #9) - Chrome DevTools Performance tab: Record page load + scroll through section - Verify 60fps maintained (no frames >16.67ms) during: - Parallax scroll through section - Checkmark elastic stagger animation - Magnetic pull hover near CTA - Organic shape morphing animation - Test CPU throttle 6x: verify graceful degradation if <30fps - Criteria: All animations smooth 60fps, no performance bottlenecks
Test Idea 10: Cross-Browser Compatibility - Test on Chrome 100+ (primary browser) - Test on Firefox 100+ (verify parallax, elastic easing) - Test on Safari 15+ (verify SVG shapes, magnetic pull) - Test mobile Safari iOS 15+ (verify mobile fallbacks) - Test mobile Chrome Android (verify simplified animations) - Criteria: Consistent behavior across all modern browsers, mobile fallbacks work
